login.messageSuccessNouveau: Account successfully created! An email has been sent to validate your account.
login.errorMinLength: Password should be at least 8 characters
login.errorTooLong: Password exceed the maximum of characters
login.errorGlobal: An error occurred. Invalid or expired link.
login.passwordRules: Password needs to at least contain 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number.
login.errorTaken: Username or email already in use.
login.forgotSuccess: If the email address matches an account, an email has been sent
login.errorForgotGlobal: An error occurred. Please check the address or try again.
